mapper.select: select sum(caslt_cnt) as region_cnt, sido_sgg_nm, yearDt from accident_old where sido_sgg_nm like '서울%' and yearDt = '2020-01-01' union select sum(caslt_cnt) as region_cnt, sido_sgg_nm, yearDt from accident_old where sido_sgg_nm like '부산%' and yearDt = '2020-01-01' union select sum(caslt_cnt) as region_cnt, sido_sgg_nm , yearDt from accident_old where sido_sgg_nm like '대구%' and yearDt = '2020-01-01' union select sum(caslt_cnt) as region_cnt, sido_sgg_nm, yearDt from accident_old where sido_sgg_nm like '인천%' and yearDt = '2020-01-01' union select sum(caslt_cnt) as region_cnt, sido_sgg_nm, yearDt from accident_old where sido_sgg_nm like '광주%' and yearDt = '2020-01-01' union select sum(caslt_cnt) as region_cnt, sido_sgg_nm , yearDt from accident_old where sido_sgg_nm like '대전%' and yearDt = '2020-01-01' union select sum(caslt_cnt) as region_cnt, sido_sgg_nm, yearDt from accident_old where sido_sgg_nm like '울산%' and yearDt = '2020-01-01' union select sum(caslt_cnt) as region_cnt, sido_sgg_nm, yearDt from accident_old where sido_sgg_nm like '세종%' and yearDt = '2020-01-01' union select sum(caslt_cnt) as region_cnt, sido_sgg_nm, yearDt from accident_old where sido_sgg_nm like '경기%' and yearDt = '2020-01-01' union select sum(caslt_cnt) as region_cnt, sido_sgg_nm , yearDt from accident_old where sido_sgg_nm like '강원%' and yearDt = '2020-01-01' union select sum(caslt_cnt) as region_cnt, sido_sgg_nm , yearDt from accident_old where sido_sgg_nm like '충%북%' and yearDt = '2020-01-01' union select sum(caslt_cnt) as region_cnt, sido_sgg_nm , yearDt from accident_old where sido_sgg_nm like '충%남%' and yearDt = '2020-01-01' union select sum(caslt_cnt) as region_cnt, sido_sgg_nm , yearDt from accident_old where sido_sgg_nm like '전%북%' and yearDt = '2020-01-01' union select sum(caslt_cnt) as region_cnt, sido_sgg_nm , yearDt from accident_old where sido_sgg_nm like '전%남%' and yearDt = '2020-01-01' union select sum(caslt_cnt) as region_cnt, sido_sgg_nm , yearDt from accident_old where sido_sgg_nm like '경%북%' and yearDt = '2020-01-01' union select sum(caslt_cnt) as region_cnt, sido_sgg_nm , yearDt from accident_old where sido_sgg_nm like '경%남%' and yearDt = '2020-01-01' union select sum(caslt_cnt) as region_cnt, sido_sgg_nm , yearDt from accident_old where sido_sgg_nm like '제주%' and yearDt = '2020-01-01';
